# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Status |
|---------|--------|
| 0.1.x   | ✅ Supported |
| < 0.1.x | ❌ Not Supported |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

To report a security vulnerability, please email `axect.tg@proton.me`. We will acknowledge receipt of your report within 48 hours. Please do not open public issues for security vulnerabilities; instead, use this dedicated reporting channel.
